title: My Love
description: After realizing that Jason Powers is a perfect fit for her, Sophia realizes that his jet-setting billionaire lifestyle is not, tearing her between her normal, comfortable life in Jacksonville and the adventurous jet-setting lifestyle that Jason has planned for her.  If you liked Bared to You or Fifty Shades, you will like this story!  Sophia is finally living her dream life - she's got an amazing job, an amazing man, and all yesterday's problems are far away. As she prepares to settle into her new, slower-paced life, Jason has other plans, whisking her away to New York City for the day.  Although Sophia enjoys the sentiment, she can't help but realize that committing to Jason means throwing away a comfortable, quiet life. Will she compromise her comfortable Jacksonville lifestyle to keep up with ambitious, billionaire CEO? And will Jason learn how to finally slow down and live a slower-paced life?  **This 11k word new adult erotic romance contains strong language and explicit scenes, including steamy hot sex between two characters. Adult readers only!***   keywords: m/f, new adult sex
author: Violette Paradis
